title: Bonus: Therapy in the Black Community from Beyond the Scenes
itunes:title: Bonus: Therapy in the Black Community from Beyond the Scenes
description:
Roy Wood Jr. is joined by Daily Show writers X Mayo and Ashton Womack for a deeply personal discussion about mental health, the Black church, the Black Lives Matter movement and more.

 

Hear a new episode of Beyond the Scenes every Tuesday wherever you get your podcasts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
